synopsis: In this enlightening episode of Pineapple Blend Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir delve into the complexities of work-life balance, sharing personal experiences and insights on mental health. They discuss the importance of self-awareness, the impact of societal expectations, and the journey toward finding fulfillment beyond conventional success, all while encouraging listeners to explore their passions and prioritize their well-being.
quotes: Quote of the Day: 'Work-life balance is about you; it’s your life, and you deserve to feel whole and satisfied at the end of each day.'
'When you’re feeling overwhelmed, just ask yourself, what would love have me do today?'
'Life happens between the work hard and play hard; don’t forget to live in the moments in between.'
'It’s not about the number of hours you work; it’s about the quality of life you create for yourself.'
'We need to redefine our relationship with social media and understand how it affects our well-being.'
'Everything can become a job if you’re not careful, even the things you love.'
'The most creative mind is a bored mind; allow yourself to wander and explore.'
'Burnout is not just about working too many hours; it’s about neglecting the soul.'
'We’re all on a spectrum of stability and meaning; it’s about finding your balance.'
'What’s the point of achieving success if you’re not fulfilled in the process?'
